pages.name: Health I
pages.text: By strengthening the structure of the chassis, the turret gains 25% additional health.$(br2)$(o)Note: These will not increase the turrets health automatically! You must heal it afterwards.$()

pages.name: Health II
pages.text: Further increases the maximum turret health by 25% (in total: 50%).$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Health I to be installed.$()

pages.name: Health III
pages.text: Increases the maximum turret health even further by 25% (in total: 75%).$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Health II to be installed.$()$(br)$(3)$(o)Can only be applied to tiers 1-4

pages.name: Health IV
pages.text: Maximum strengthening of the turret increases its maximum health by 25% (in total: 100%).$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Health III to be installed.$()$(br)$(3)$(o)Can only be applied to tiers 1-3
